author: ben e mercer
description: I THINK THIS IS A GOOD IDEA FOR NOTHING MOVE ABOUT WHEN IT IS FROZEN. THIS STOPS TRANFER. IF FROZEN LONG ENOUGH IT WILL DIE. I THINK THIS GERM IS SPREAD THROUGH SWEAT AND IN A HOT COUNTRY ITS MORE RAPID. A LITTLE SWEAT DROPEN HERE AND THERE NO ON CAN SEE IT. HEAT IS IT STRONG CARD. TAKE HEAT AWAY YOU KILL ITS MOVEMENT. WHEN PEOPLE WALK WITHOUT SHOES, THEY PICK UP MOISTURE. FROM SWEAT DROPS.
summary: THE EBOLA GERM CAN BE KILLED BY FREEZING IT. A  TEMPERATURE OF 30 DEGRES OR LOWER. ROOMS SET UP WITH THIS DEGRES CAN EVEN SET UP IN HOT WEATHER COUNTRIES.
title: THE EBOLA GERM IS FROZEN
